name: Picker Detail Report
query:
select concat(a.first_name,' ',ifnull(a.last_name,'')) as "Picker::200",a.sales_order as "Sales Order::150",a.item_code as "Item Code::250",a.start_time
    ,a.end_time ,a.lama_hari as "Task Completion Duration:200",
	a.qty as "Quantity:Float:90" from (select tu.first_name,tu.last_name,pl.start_time,pl.end_time,
	pli.sales_order,soi.item_code,soi.qty,case datediff(pl.end_time,pl.start_time) when 0 then concat(convert(mod(hour(timediff(pl.end_time,pl.start_time)),24),char),':',
	convert(minute(timediff(pl.end_time,pl.start_time)),char))
	else concat(convert(datediff(pl.end_time,pl.start_time),char),' day,',convert(mod(hour(timediff(pl.end_time,pl.start_time)),24),char),':',
	convert(minute(timediff(pl.end_time,pl.start_time)),char)) end lama_hari from
	`tabPick List` pl inner join `tabPick List Item` pli on pl.name = pli.parent
    inner join `tabSales Order Item` soi on pli.sales_order = soi.parent
    left join `tabUser` tu on pl.picker = tu.email
    where pl.picker is not null and pli.sales_order is not null) a;
